name: Calamity!
description:
All assets made from scratch in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49

It's your first day working at Poulet Labs and something has gone awfully awry. Can you fix it before the whole place falls apart?

Controls

WASD - Movement
E - Interact
Mouse - Camera

Team

Erik Rahm - programming
Tyler Hahn - modelling, environment design, music
Christian Krueger - sound, programming
Devan Brown - illustration, story, design

Spoilers:

1. Put fire out
2. Locate sounds with a high frequency
3. Align the rotating lenses
